Sonage A-Eye Peptide Serum

Brand: Sonage

Category: Around Eye Cream

Ingredients: water, caprylic/capric triglyceride, glycerin, glyceryl stearate, potassium cetyl phosphate, sclerocarya birrea (marula) seed oil, tetradecane, cetearyl olivate, sorbitan olivate, butyrospermum parkii (shea) butter, leuconostoc/radish root ferment filtrate, tridecapeptide-1, s-pea oligopeptide-1 SP, acetyl hexapeptide-8, niacinamide,

SP, acetyl hexapeptide-8, niacinamide, caffeine, cetearyl alcohol, lactobacillus/cucurbita pepo (pumpkin) fruit ferment filtrate, lactobacillus/punica granatum (pomegranate) fruit ferment extract, hibiscus sabdariffa flower extract, avena sativa (oat) kernel extract, astaxanthin, menthyl ethylamido oxalate, sodium dehydroacetate, sodium benzoate,
